name: Roj
description: When an ambassador attempting to bring peace to the Mirror Universe is murdered, famed mediator Riva tasks you with finding the killer. But with peace the greatest anathema in the Mirror Universe, will your investigation be an exercise in futility?
rules:
-- Unique Klingon Empire, Terran Empire, and Federation Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Detmer, Riva, Worf, or crew with the Mirror Universe trait will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Detmer, Riva, Worf, or Mirror Universe
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Worf
featured_crew.flavor: Commander of the U.S.S. Defiant, a warship that saw action against the Dominion and Borg.

screens.text: "It is with a heavy heart that I reach out to you today, Captain. My good friend and colleague, Ambassador Khett, died under mysterious circumstances while attempting to mediate the myriad disputes rampant within the Mirror Universe."

"I say 'died', but the conditions of his death are enough to ellicit suspicion of foul play. Poison was detected on his body. We can be certain of nothing at this point, however, and the Terrans are a proud people. I fear if too many learn we suspect foul play, they might--"

"Might what? Slit your throat to shut you up? We have better things to do than go after some Federation lackey. And my people didn't kill your meddlesome little reptile man. But I'd watch your tongue before you make such salacious accusations."

"Watch your tongue, Terran refuse. This 'lackey' is the only reason my people have a word for 'peace'. Ambassador Khett was my charge. I will avenge him. So help me, if I learn you Terrans had a hand in his death, I'll--"

"You'll what? Rupture my eardrums with some of that ridiculous Klingon opera? Please. My people didn't kill your ambassador, Captain, and to prove it, Emperors Georgiou and Spock have offered whomever of our number are available. Just don't drop the ball on your end."
